content.question: The scenes depicted in the work are intended to convey the ancient Egyptian concept of

choices.label: justice and morality, by depicting the divine judgment of a mortal person’s life
mercy and forgiveness of sins, represented by Osiris granting absolution to believers
the cyclical nature of the cosmos, by showing Anubis overseeing the rebirth of the dead
the divine nature of the pharaoh, presented in his role as protector of order and stability

content.answer: justice and morality, by depicting the divine judgment of a mortal person’s life

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art
